DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect multiple dos verapamil plasma concentration single dose SAM-531 healthy young adult subject assess safety tolerability co-administration SAM-531 verapamil .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating The Potential Interaction Between Verapamil Immediate Release And SAM-531 When Co-Administered
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Body mass index range 18 30 kg/m2 body weight great 50 kg . 2 . Healthy determine investigator basis medical history , physical examination finding , clinical laboratory test result , vital sign measurement , digital 12lead ECG reading . Exclusion criterion : 1 . Presence history disorder may prevent successful completion study . 2 . Any significant cardiovascular , hepatic , renal , respiratory , gastrointestinal ( GI ) , endocrine , immunologic , dermatologic , hematologic , neurologic , psychiatric disease .
